reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Personal data like Email Id for verification purpose, Tracking Information such as IP address of the device and Device ID when connected to the Internet, and Details of Website usage for analytics.

content: Tracking Information (e.g., IP address, Device ID)
Details of Website usage for analytics

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the specific types of data mentioned in the 'INFORMATION WE COLLECT' section of the privacy policy document.
reply.reference: Personal data i.e. Email Id for verification purpose. Tracking Information such as, but not limited to the IP address of your device and Device ID when connected to the Internet. This information may include the URL that you just came from... Details of Website usage for analytics. URL: https://mindalcove.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that before collecting personal information, they will identify the purposes for which the information is being collected. It also mentions that personal information will be used solely to fulfill specified purposes, and data collection will be done with the knowledge and consent of the individual concerned.
reply.reference: Before or at the time of collecting personal information, we will identify the purposes for which information is being collected... We will collect and use your personal information solely to fulfil those purposes specified by us, within the scope of the consent of the individual concerned... We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and with the knowledge and consent of the individual concerned. URL: https://mindalcove.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data by sending an email to contact@mindalcove.com.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can withdraw their consent, or request to download or delete their data at any time by contacting the provided email address.
reply.reference: To withdraw your consent, or to request the download or delete your data with us for any or all our services at any time, please email to contact@mindalcove.com. URL: https://mindalcove.com/privacy-policy

Policy shall be deemed as accepted by the User on their continued use of the Website.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as necessary to carry out service requests or send offers based on user interests and prior activity.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app may share data with third parties in situations where it is necessary to carry out service requests or send offers based on user interests and prior activity.
reply.reference: Where any service requested by You involves a third party, such information as is reasonably necessary by the Website to carry out Your service request may be shared with such third party. We also do use your contact information to send you offers based on your interests and prior activity. URL: https://mindalcove.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: External service providers, law enforcement agencies, and other government officials are the third parties with which the app may share data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app may disclose personally identifiable information to external service providers, law enforcement agencies, and other government officials as necessary.
reply.reference: External Service Providers: There may be several services offered by external service providers that help you use our Website. If you choose to use these optional services, and in the course of doing so, disclose information to the external service providers, and/or permit them to collect information about you, then their use of your information is governed by their privacy policy. Law and Order: We cooperate with law enforcement inquiries, as well as other third parties to enforce laws, such as intellectual property rights, fraud and other rights. We can (and you authorize us to) disclose any information about you to law enforcement where the FIR is filed against the user and other government officials as we, in our sole discretion, believe necessary or appropriate, in connection with an investigation of fraud, intellectual property infringements, or other activity that is illegal or may expose us or you to legal liability. URL: https://mindalcove.com/privacy-policy
